sections.heading: 7 through 19 of this act shall be known and may be cited as the "Scenic Rivers Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1970, c. 68, ยง 1, emerg. eff. March 17, 1970. Amended by Laws 2003, c. 305, ยง 1, emerg. eff. May 28, 2003; Laws 2016, c. 297, ยง 7, eff. July 1, 2016. Renumbered from ยง 1451 of this title by Laws 2016, c
